strategy: Apply polynomial feature expansion on key numerical variables (e.g., area, year_built) with degree 2 to capture non-linear relationships between features and house prices. Combine this with a Random Forest regressor to model complex interactions and reduce overfitting. Use cross-validation to tune the polynomial degree and prevent overfitting.
